        public void addHandler(java.lang.String pattern,
                       MessageHandler handler)
        Description copied from interface: MessageConsumer
        Add new MessageHandler mapping with message type mapping to the current configuration.

        Message is routed to the first handler the pattern of which matches the message type.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        pattern - message type pattern
        handler - message handler
